description:
Nova Network sets fixed ips to leased when it gets a notification from nova-dhcpbridge.  There are some situations where leased isn't properly set if it is restarted or turned off when the ip is first leased.

This can be fixed by allowing 'old' messages from nova-dhcpbridge to also call lease.
title: Ips aren't set to leased properly if nova-network node is down or restarted
